attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: any M.P found guilty of gross mis-use of position,mis-use of privilege, mis-use of taxpayers money, mis-representation of expenses etc. should have to relinquish all positions with immediate effect. Also lose all privileges of financial support after leaving parliament including pension rights.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/honest-mps/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
